messages.title: TIME TO CARE FOR OUR NHS
messages.content: Over a million people have waited longer than four hours in A&E over the last 12 months. Waiting lists are rising. Under the Tory led government the NHS is in crisis.

messages.title: TIME TO GET A GRIP ON PLANNING
messages.content: Planning has become a developer led free-for-all in North West Leicestershire and Labour is determined to get a grip on it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to invest in NHS and reduce waiting times, ensuring provision of a world class health service.
Labour's plan for planning includes fighting the developer-led free-for-all and working with local residents on local planning issues.
Labour's plan includes making work pay, establishing a fairer tax system, tackling childcare costs and backing business to improve the economy and eliminate the deficit by 2020.

issues.economy: Labour's plan: making work pay, fairer taxes, help to balance books; Backing business by cutting business rates, promote apprenticeships; Tackling childcare costs, guaranteeing primary school places; Help with energy bills.
issues.education: Promoting apprenticeships, guaranteeing primary school places.
issues.health: Labour's commitment to invest in the NHS, aiming to provide quality care, reducing waiting times, and collaborating with local councils.

housing.content: Planning in North West Leicestershire is discussed as being developer-led and problematic, with a pledge to involve local residents more in the planning process.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jamie McMahon was selected by local people to be Labour’s parliamentary candidate for North West Leicestershire over 18 months ago.

politicalExperience.role: Labour’s parliamentary candidate for North West Leicestershire
politicalExperience.achievements: Met thousands of local people and listened to their issues and concerns.

contactInformation.address: Labour NWL FREEPOST RSKS-LTXE-BRUC, Unit A5, Springboard Centre, Mantle Lane, Coalville, LE67 3DW

images.caption: Images of Jamie McMahon interacting with constituents, an infograph comparing Tory MP's stance on NHS and planning with Jamie's position, and various campaign activities and endorsements.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet contains an invitation for locals to share their views about issues and concerns they would like their local Labour team to know about.
